info.title: Myriad RES v6 by Broadcast Radio

get.summary: Returns the basic status of Myriad Remote Edit Server and any open Stations
Returns the exact version of Myriad Remote Edit Server
Returns the ProfileName that Myriad was started with. The default is "Profile1"

Returns the total number of media items in the database.
Warning: Calling with fulldetails=true is rate limited to once per minute.
Returns the total duration of all media items in the database.
Returns the information about the specified Media Id
Reads each of the media item specified in the list of mediaIds
Returns all the media items in the specified range
Returns all the media items in the specified range with extra information. The extra information can increase the time taken to respond and increase workload on the server.

Returns all the media items in the specified range with extra information. Requesting either higher returnInfo or returnExtraInfo can increase the time taken to respond and increase workload on the server, and you should avoid setting maxResultCount to a high number as this could result in significant data processing.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: You must also specify the stationId, attributesStationId and itemType to use this parameter

parameters.name: returnInfo
parameters.description: Request additional information from the database

parameters.name: returnExtraInfo
parameters.description: Request extra information from linked tables within the database such as Most Recent Play information

parameters.name: maxResultCount
parameters.description: If not specified, defaults to the value set in Database Settings.

get.summary: Gets the Now Playing information for the specified station

X-API-Key.description: API Key for accessing secure APIs
X-API-Key.name: X-API-Key
